goal.en: This course takes Laozi‘s text and seven chapters of Zhuangzi as the main content. Based on the development of contemporary psychology, it attempts to conduct a philosophical analysis and restoration of Laozi‘s thoughts on heaven and man and the meaning behind the metaphors of Zhuangzi‘s stories from the perspective of body concept and gongfu theory. , through classroom introduction and multiple discussions, students are encouraged to deeply grasp the deep discussion structure of Zhuangzi’s text and its guiding characteristics for contemporary souls.
goal.ch: 本課程以老子道德經、莊子七篇作為上課主要內容，就當代心理學之發展，試圖從身體觀及工夫論角度，針對老子天人思想及莊子故事隱喻背後的意涵進行哲學式的分析還原，透過課堂的導讀及多項討論，促使同學深入掌握莊子文本的深層論述結構及對當代心靈的指引特色。
